name: TRANSFUBER
description:
Transfuber is platformer game where the protagonist is a Cube which can transform its color and size by sucking in or ejecting out cubes of the same color. Based on its size and color, the player needs to interact with the world and complete the level.This is our 1st game prototype made in Unreal Engine 4 in a time frame of 5 days for the Epic Spring Jam 2018.

Team Members :
# Aditya Muley - Game Developer & BGM Composition
# Sandeep K Pilakhanawal - Game Developer
# Vikas Sharma - Arts, Shaders and Level Design
# Sharad Jaiswal - 3D Modeling
# Ankit Saxena - 3D Modeling and Video Editing

A game by CoffeeCats
